text: is there a waty to get completed certifcations from the API?

I am using an api call to the contact using propertiesWithHistory to get the last marketing email name, last marketing email open date, last marketing email click date. In the latter 2, all I have are dates but not the email associated with, not even an id. I'm pretty sure that in not every case will the length of marketing email sends = marketing emails opened or clicked, so is there a way to associate the marketing dates with the marketing email

When the user enters their email in an input and clicks a button, it opens a modal that has a HubSpot form inside it and it sets the value of the form’s email field to whatever the user had entered; when submitting that form though, it reverts back to nothing or the browser autofilled value.

Hi, <@UP452DA2Z>, I was also going through the same problem as you were until I saw this post, and the solution was good, just needed little tweaks here and there, and this is the solution I came up with.
